values: 剥夺；夺走（财物等）；剥去；剥光；脱去（衣物）；拆卸；清除；剥落；剥离；除去覆盖物；拆除（家具、设备等）；剥掉（果皮、表皮等）；磨损（螺纹）；折断（齿轮的齿）；使失去动力；解体（机器等以修理或检查）；削减（成本、资源等）；脱衣表演；搬走（室内的）家具；为（烟草）去梗；为（烟叶）去中肋；从（某处）拿走所有东西；剪掉（羊的毛）；挤干（牛等）的奶；挤（奶）；不旋转；使不旋转
（纸、金属、织物等）条；带；长条；条状物；条形物；带状物；（土地或其他表面的）窄长区域；带状地带；（报刊上的）连环画；脱衣表演；脱衣舞表演；球队的制服；（机场的）跑道；简易机场；简易跑道；（车辆的）装饰条；（电影、摄影的）胶片条；（计算机内存的）存储块；<英>（总称）（尤指足球队员穿的）彩条球衣；运动队服；<英>[矿]捣矿机排矿沉淀槽；<英>定期播出的节目

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 剥夺（strip的过去分词形式）；脱衣；把…剪成条状
脱衣舞女；剥离器；脱模机
拆开；去膜；加条纹；条纹图案

word_group.brief_definition: 隆隆标志带；齿纹标志带

bilingual.source: Different types of feed net strip and steel strip.
I can not strip her panty off!
I have a magnetic strip ID card.
bilingual.target: 我有一张带磁条的身份证。

bilingual.source: Align each skid strip on roof panel.
bilingual.target: 对齐车顶嵌板上的防滑带.

bilingual.source: V/F/F/S machines produce sachet and strip packaging.
bilingual.target: 立式机器生产香囊和带的包装。

bilingual.source: Production of aluminium and aluminium alloy plate, sheet and strip
Another new product for wood decks is a decking strip.
bilingual.target: 木甲板上的另一个新产品是一个覆盖带。

bilingual.source: I work in a strip joint that just opened.
bilingual.target: 我在一家地带联合刚开。

bilingual.source: Hinge leaves are blanked out of strip steel.
bilingual.target: 铰链叶片是带钢冲压出来的.

list.abstract: strip（英 [strɪp]，美 [strɪp]），英语单词，作动词为除去；取走；使空无一物。作动词为脱衣；队服；球衣。短语搭配有magnetic strip（磁条；磁力带；磁性条）、strip of（一条；条形）。例句为“She saw a brown strip of plough（她看见一片棕色的耕地）”。 strip相关近义词动词类有shear、destitute of，名词类有belt、band。相关反义词有dress。
《Strip》是Little Mix、Sharaya J演唱的一首歌曲，由Sharaya J/Perrie Edwards、Camille Purcell、Chris Loco、Jesy Nelson、Leigh-Anne Pinnock、Jade Thirlwall作词、作曲，收录于Little Mix2018年11月16日发行的专辑《LM5 (Deluxe)》中。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, we all have to play strip poker.
He then applies the strip to Dave's palm.
Amy has a fondness for the comic strip Marmaduke.
yingyinNormal.zh: Amy非常喜欢《大丹麦狗马默杜克》这部漫画。

yingyinNormal.en: When handling the ricin strip, operate with extreme caution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在使用蓖麻毒的时候要十分小心。

yingyinNormal.en: Even momentary flesh contact with the exposed strip is fatal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哪怕只稍稍碰一下都是致命的。

yingyinNormal.en: Strip poker, we should totally play strip poker. No, no. What? Are you crazy?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们应该来玩脱衣扑克牌。不，你疯了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: That I invite the local criminals to drop in and strip the house bare?
yingyinNormal.zh: 把当地的罪犯都请进房子来洗劫一空吗？

yingyinNormal.en: On the plus side, I hear they have the best strip clubs in the country.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过往好处想，我听说这里的艳舞俱乐部全国顶尖。

yingyinNormal.en: That's what we are when we strip everything away. That I can understand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抛开一切，我们两个就是那样的关系。那我能理解。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not going to walk into the lab, ask her to strip naked and dance for me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会去实验室，要她为我跳脱衣舞。

yingyinNormal.en: Dave will bow to Kim then shake his hand, immediately disposing of the strip in his jacket pocket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 戴夫要给金正恩鞠躬，然后握手，马上把贴边放入衣服口袋。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Now it's time to hit The Strip. If everything's big in Vegas, it's a hundred times bigger here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好！现在是时候去拉斯维加斯大道逛逛了。如果在拉斯维加斯的所有东西都是美妙的，那这里就是百倍的美妙。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, and his father invented that magnetic strip on the back of credit cards. Oh, I like credit cards.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且他老爸还发明了信用卡背面的磁条。我也爱死信用卡了。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't think I have the strip club in me tonight. I'm just gonna get some ginger ale and watch some pay-per-view.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我今晚不想去脱衣舞俱乐部了，我只要一杯姜汁汽水，看些付费表演就好。

yingyinNormal.en: The resorts on the Strip are so vast and self-contained, it's possible to land in one and not step outside again for the rest of your stay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拉斯维加斯大道上的度假村地方十分大，而且自给自足，入住进其中一间，便不用再出门找其他娱乐了。

yingyinNormal.en: Bingo. Got it in the one. Now, this one, I'm really rather fond of. This is meat floss, also known as hot strip. It's proper name is Latiao.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正确，一下就猜对了。喔，这个东西，我真的非常喜欢它。这个…是肉丝，也叫辣条。它就叫辣条。

yingyinNormal.en: We gambled. We went to one of those cheesy wedding chapels. We had a really good turkey dinner. Which was surprising, since we were at a strip club.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们赌了钱，然后去了那种很破的婚礼小教堂，吃了一顿不错的火鸡晚餐，很意外，因为我们当时在脱衣舞店。

yingyinNormal.en: Latiao is most popular snack for under-25s in China. Right. And the market is worth an estimated 50 billion Yuan per year. That is a lot of hot strip.
yingyinNormal.zh: 辣条是中国25岁以下年轻人最受欢迎的小吃，这个市场据估计每年有500亿元。那真是好多的辣条。

yingyinNormal.en: Jeremy Lin drives and finishes. Nice play from Lin. There's a strip of it. Lin throws it ahead to toney douglas. Up for the layup! Banks it in! Here comes shumpert to Lin. Lin flips it up and puts it in. Jeremy Lin once again!
yingyinNormal.zh: 林书豪突破上篮，漂亮的上篮得分，丢球了，林书豪长传给道格拉斯，擦板得分，山姆波特杀过来了，传球给林，林上篮，球进了，又是林书豪！

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 条纹；长条；线条；V型臂章；鞭挞；类型；类别

word_family.mean: v. 除去；取走；使空无一物；搬光；夺去；剥夺；出售；磨掉…的螺纹；折断…齿；不旋转

examination_example.sentence: Downloading and consuming culture requires great skills, but failing to move beyond downloading is to <highlight>strip</highlight> oneself of a defining constituent of humanity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下载并享受文学作品需要很高的技巧，但如果仅限于下载的话，那么就等于剥夺了下载者自身作为人类的一种重要能力。

sense_info_list.en: remove parts of a machine, vehicle, or engine in order to clean or repair it
a long, narrow piece of cloth, paper, plastic, or some other material

word_usage.usage:
strip A from/off B意为“把A从B中除掉”，相当于strip B of A，如：
Deer had stripped all the bark off the tree. 
鹿把树皮全都啃光了。
Deer had stripped the tree of its bark. 
鹿啃掉了树皮。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“全然剥夺”，指剥去衣服或覆盖物。
意为“抢劫”，指公然地用暴力抢劫他人的所有物。
意为“夺走，剥夺”，指夺去必要的、有价值的或称心的东西，多用以指剥夺人的权利等抽象的东西。

direction_info.description:

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

examination_example.sentence: So, it is argued, <highlight>stripping</highlight> cartons of their branding will trigger no mass movement to quit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，有人认为，剥离纸箱的品牌不会引发大规模退出运动。

examination_example.sentence: The theory is that smoking should be <highlight>stripped</highlight> of any appeal to discourage new generations from starting in the first place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个理论是应该去除吸烟的任何吸引力，以此防止新生代的人开始吸烟。

sense_info_list.en: remove parts of a machine, vehicle, or engine in order to clean or repair it
a main road in or leading out of a town that is lined with shops, restaurants, and other facilities
deprive someone of rank, power, or property
a long, narrow piece of cloth, paper, plastic, or some other material

examination_example.sentence: Rich countries are <highlight>stripping</highlight> poor ones of their resources.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 富国正在剥夺穷国的资源。

sense_info_list.en: remove parts of a machine; vehicle; or engine in order to clean or repair it

examination_example.sentence: The hollowed-out A300 was <highlight>stripped</highlight> of everything potentially harmful to the environment and sunk off the Aegean coast today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这架中空的 A300 被拆除了所有可能对环境有害的物品，于今日在爱琴海沿岸沉海。

sense_info_list.en: a long; narrow piece of cloth; paper; plastic; or some other material

examination_example.sentence: The store's card reader failed to scan the card's magnetic <highlight>strip</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 商店的读卡器无法扫描卡的磁条。
